text: 11.51 Stt 4.8, 2 Sto 24.20-21 Mɨŋel anɨb ak nɨm, bɨ Ebel nop ned jɨj gɨl paklɨl, ñag dad apɨl, ñag dad apɨl, kɨdek Sekalaya nop paklɨlak agak. God nop agnɨgep kal awl ak adaŋ, God nop tap ñeb tep ak adaŋ, nab sɨŋak nop ñaglɨlak agak. Nɨbop nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl apin agak. Takaw mɨŋel anɨb ak mɨdupsek binɨb mɨñɨl mɨdebal okok dɨnɨgabal agak.
